column6: AVENGERS DISASSEMBLED BEGINS HERE! The powerhouse team of Brian Michael Bendis and David Finch take on Earth's Mightiest Heroes in this double-sized anniversary issue!   It begins with the return of an Avenger thought dead--and by the time it's over, everything you know about the Avengers will have changed! AN EVENT THAT WILL ROCK THE ENTIRETY OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE -- AND IT ALL STARTS HERE, TRUE BELIEVER!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | colorist:Frank D'Armata | penciller (cover):David Finch | inker:Danny K. Miki
